vulnerable_code: public void checkClientTrusted(X509Certificate[] x509Certificates, String s) throws CertificateException {}
description: The checkClientTrusted method does not perform any validation on the client certificate, which could lead to insecure communication.
recommendation: Validate the client certificate by checking its expiry, issuer, and signature within the checkClientTrusted method.

vulnerable_code: public void checkServerTrusted(X509Certificate[] x509Certificates, String s) throws CertificateException {}
description: The checkServerTrusted method does not perform any validation on the server certificate, which could lead to insecure communication.
recommendation: Validate the server certificate by checking its expiry, issuer, and signature within the checkServerTrusted method.
